name: Le Carnival of AHHh
description:
A 2D platformer game that includes boss fights!
Help your little egg man complete the carnival games!

Controls (which are taught during the tutorial)
A,D -> move left and right
Spacebar -> jump (hold to jump higher, able to double jump)
Left Shift -> Dash in the direction you are facing
Left Mouse Click (or touchpad) -> Attack (hold w or s while clicking to attack up/ down respectively)
